data.eml:eml: Malacoctenus brunoi sp. n. (Blennioidei: Labrisomidae), a new scaled-blenny from Trindade Island, off Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guimarães, Ricardo Z. P., Nunan, Gustavo W., Gasparini, João Luiz (2010): Malacoctenus brunoi sp. n. (Blennioidei: Labrisomidae), a new scaled-blenny from Trindade Island, off Brazil. Zootaxa 2567: 50-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197281
